# opgave 2

```{r}
set.seed(69)
n <- 30
b0 <- 1
b1 <- 1
x <- rnorm(n,2,2)
u <- rnorm(n,0,exp(0.6*x))
y <- b0 + b1*x + u

fit <- lm(y ~ x)
coef(summary(fit))


hcc <- sandwich::vcovHC(fit)
hcc

(fit$coefficients[2] - 0)/hcc[2,2]
n_y <- (1/(exp(0.6*x)) * y)
n_x <- (1/(exp(0.6*x)) * x)


fit_2 <- lm(n_y ~ n_x)

summary(fit_2)
```
